mapper.select:
/*kr.go.bai.eip.aep.cfr.dao.AEPCFR008PMapper.selectTBDCMACM001M*/
SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') > #{maxIfStrDh} then '등록' WHEN TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') > #{maxIfStrDh} then '수정' ELSE '기타' END IF_CHNG_STAT_DVSN , F_CODE_NM('1000338', A.USR_DVSN_CD) AS USR_DVSN_CD , A.USR_ID , A.CNB , A.USR_NAM , F_CODE_NM('1000144', A.DPT_CD) AS DPT_NM , F_CODE_NM('1000144', A.SUB_DPT_CD) AS SUB_DPT_NM , A.RQS_STA_CD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.RLS_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RLS_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.WRK_END_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRK_END_DT , 'TBDCMACM001M' AS TBL_NM FROM TBDCMACM001M A WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') > #{maxIfStrDh}

/*kr.go.bai.eip.aep.cfr.dao.AEPCFR008PMapper.selectTBDCMACM002M*/
SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') > #{maxIfStrDh} then '등록' WHEN TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') > #{maxIfStrDh} then '수정' ELSE '기타' END IF_CHNG_STAT_DVSN , A.DPT_CD , A.DPT_NM , A.TNB , A.FAN , A.ABR_DPT_NM_1 , A.ABR_DPT_NM_2 , A.FRML_DPT_NM , F_CODE_NM('1000144', A.HIRK_DPT_CD) AS HIRK_DPT_NM , F_CODE_NM('1000481', A.ORZT_DVSN_CD) AS ORZT_DVSN_CD , 'TBDCMACM002M' AS TBL_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M A WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') > #{maxIfStrDh}

/*kr.go.bai.eip.aep.cfr.dao.AEPCFR008PMapper.selectTBCSPIIT006M*/
SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') > #{maxIfStrDh} then '등록' WHEN TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') > #{maxIfStrDh} then '수정' ELSE '기타' END IF_CHNG_STAT_DVSN , A.GCC_ORG_CD , A.ALL_ORG_NM , A.LOWT_ORG_NM , A.ORG_RAK_NO , A.GCC_CON_HNDL_DVSN_CD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CRE_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CRE_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.ABLT_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ABLT_DT , A.BK_ORG_CD , 'TBCSPIIT006M' AS TBL_NM FROM TBCSPIIT006M A WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') > #{maxIfStrDh}
